item.description:
Argentina and Malbecs are all the rage today.  Experience what else South America has to offer.  We'll sample wines from Chile, Argentina and Uruguay to see what else is on tap with our neighbors to the south.  100% of proceeds go to St. Bernadette School in New Haven.  Light accompaniments will be offered along with the wines.

 

Cost: $30 per person, includes a Riedel Wine Glass to keep, $20 for any additional class

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Grand Vin New Haven's Wine 101 Part 9 Wines from South America
